Hoary 5.04
- Headphone works, but i have to mute the Master volume and adjust the PCM by hand, it doesn't work when i plug in the headphone, it continues to sound on speakers too.
- The Mute, Volume Up/Down special buttons can be configured in key shortcuts by pressing it.
